_AIDE_GENERALE: Remplis ce fichier avec tes infos CS2 et renvoie-le moi ! Les champs avec _AIDE t'expliquent quoi mettre.
_AIDE_id: Ton pseudo en minuscules, sans espaces ni accents. Ex: scream, tonpote, kennyS
_AIDE_pseudo: Ton pseudo in-game tel qu'il s'affiche. Ex: ScreaM, TonPote
_AIDE_photo: Laisse vide, je m'en occupe. Sinon envoie-moi une photo avec le fichier.
_AIDE_nationalite: Ton pays en anglais. Ex: France, Belgium, Morocco, Canada

bio: Louis "PORNO" Garlement is the head coach of Porning and a former Racelard.team player. As a player he was notable for recording one of the lowest multikill rates in competitive play â€” a shortcoming he has since turned into coaching strength by teaching players how to win rounds through spacing, utility, and teamwork rather than solo fragging. PORNO now specializes in mental preparation, rotations and post-round analysis; his experience (and humility) make him an effective coach for developing rosters.
